Trump's Gold Pen

Trump’s Golden Pen: Ah yes, the golden pen. Did you know Trump often signs his name with a gold pen? Much like his branding tries to put a cheesy “gold” covering over his bull$#!^, he seems to think a poorly veiled turd combined with superlatives like “AMAZING!” is enough to fool people. We aren’t fooled, and in our opinion his attempts end up looking something like this.
